hero.title: Payments Infrastructure for the Machine Economy
hero.subtitle: The universal billing layer for autonomous systems.
hero.description: One API to track usage, enforce limits, and collect payments from any machine, agent, or protocol.

usageTracking.title: Usage Tracking
usageTracking.description: Track every API call, token, and compute unit in real-time with sub-millisecond precision.

rateLimiting.title: Smart Rate Limiting
rateLimiting.description: Enforce usage limits automatically. Protect your APIs from abuse while maximizing revenue.

billing.title: Flexible Billing
billing.description: Per-request, per-token, subscription, or outcome-based. Bill the way your customers want.

analytics.title: Real-time Analytics
analytics.description: Understand your usage patterns, identify top customers, and optimize pricing in real-time.

security.title: Enterprise Security
security.description: SOC 2 ready, GDPR compliant, with audit trails and role-based access control.

global.title: Global Scale
global.description: Edge-deployed across 50+ locations. Sub-5ms latency anywhere in the world.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Start free, scale as you grow

cta.title: Ready to monetize the machine economy?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of developers building the future of autonomous commerce.
